00023 package org.bn;
00024 
00113 import org.bn.coders.BERDecoder;
00114 import org.bn.coders.BEREncoder;
00115 import org.bn.coders.PERAlignedDecoder;
00116 import org.bn.coders.PERAlignedEncoder;
00117 import org.bn.coders.PERUnalignedDecoder;
00118 import org.bn.coders.PERUnalignedEncoder;
00119 
00123 public class CoderFactory {
00124     private static CoderFactory instance = new CoderFactory();
00125     
00130     public static CoderFactory getInstance() {
00131         return instance;
00132     }
00133 
00138     public <T> IEncoder<T> newEncoder() throws Exception {
00139         return newEncoder("BER");
00140     }
00141 
00148     public <T> IEncoder<T> newEncoder(String encodingSchema) throws Exception {
00149         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("BER")) {
00150             return new BEREncoder<T>();
00151         }
00152         else
00153         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Aligned")) {
00154             return new PERAlignedEncoder<T>();
00155         }        
00156         else
00157         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Unaligned")) {
00158             return new PERUnalignedEncoder<T>();
00159         }        
00160         else        
00161             return null;
00162     }
00163 
00169     public IDecoder newDecoder() throws Exception {
00170         return newDecoder("BER");
00171     }
00172 
00179     public IDecoder newDecoder(String encodingSchema) throws Exception {
00180         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("BER")) {
00181             return new BERDecoder();
00182         }
00183         else
00184         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Aligned")) {
00185             return new PERAlignedDecoder();
00186         }        
00187         else
00188         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Unaligned")) {
00189             return new PERUnalignedDecoder();
00190         }        
00191         else
00192             return null;
00193     }
00194     
00195 }
